General.Name: Chambal Fertilizers & Chemicals Limited
General.Description: Chambal Fertilisers and Chemicals Limited, together with its subsidiaries, produces and sells fertilizers in India and internationally. It offers urea; and other agri-inputs, such as di-ammonium phosphate, murate of potash, single super phosphate, and pesticides, as well as fertilizers, specality fertilizers and micro nutrients, insecticides, fungicides, and herbicides under Uttam brand. The company was incorporated in 1985 and is headquartered in New Delhi, India.

2.Name: Mr. Rajveer  Singh
2.Title: VP of Legal, Compliance Officer & Company Sec.
